net.joala.testlet

Class ExceptionClassTestlet<T extends Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joala.testlet.AbstractTestlet<Class<T>>
      • net.joala.testlet.ExceptionClassTestlet<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Testlet

    public class ExceptionClassTestlet<T extends Throwable>
extends AbstractTestlet<Class<T>>

    Test an exception and its constructors. The testlet is prepared to deal with standard exception constructors. It will scan for them, feed them with information and see if the information will be available after construction.

    Since:
    10/5/12

    • Constructor Summary
